nodes.text: Borleias was an astronomical object located in the Borleias system of the Colonies region. Borleias sat at grid square K-9 on the Standard Galactic Grid.

Borleias was first mentioned in the Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2016. Borleias first appeared in X-Wing: Rogue Squadron, a 1996 novel authored by Michael A. Stackpole as the first installment of the Star Wars: X-Wing novel series.
